text: The Area 1 of Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme () is a village administrative division in Brunei-Muara District of Brunei. It is a village subdivision under the mukim or subdistrict of Gadong 'A'. The community is headed by a or village head and the incumbent is Hassan bin Ali. The area is a cluster of public housing under the government's Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme () in the vicinity of the original settlement of Tungku. It is subsequently a designated postcode area with the postcode BE2519. == Geography == The area borders the village subdivisions of Rimba to the north, Mata-Mata to the south, Katok to the west and Tungku to the north-west. It is among the populated places located on the outskirts of Bandar Seri Begawan, the capital of Brunei. == See also == * Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme Area 2 * Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme Area 3 * Tungku (village) == References == Category:Villages of Brunei
title: Tungku Landless Indigenous Citizens' Housing Scheme Area 1
